description.p: Your ability to shapechange is more than skin deep. Increase your Constitution score by 1, to a maximum of 20. In addition, when you use your Shapechanging trait, you can choose one of the following benefits, which lasts until you use your Shapechanging trait again. Some of these benefits require specific physical features, such as gills or claws, that can be seen by observers.

ul.li: Aquatic Adaptation. You adapt your body to an aquatic environment, sprouting gills and growing webbing between your fingers. You can breathe underwater and gain a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.
Darkvision. You adapt your eyes and gain darkvision with a range of 60 feet.

Natural Weapons. You grow claws, fangs, spines, horns, or a different natural weapon of your choice. Your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage, as appropriate to the natural weapon you chose, and you are proficient with your unarmed strikes.

p.em: Prerequisite: Magical Scale Shenanigans or DM Permission

description.p: You're an absolute unit. With the magical addition of bulk, you have become burl personified. You get +1 to AC, and can count as full cover for your allies.

sheet.description: You get +1 to AC, and can count as full cover for your allies.

p.em: Prerequisite: A mind reading tool for your Sister-book

description.p: You've spent a lot of time analyzing the correlation between your sister's writings and thoughts, which has provided insight into peoples true thoughts and motives. You are proficient in the Insight skill

sheet.description: You gain proficiency in the Insight skill.

p.em: Prerequisite: Friendship with a shady Bard-Borg

description.p: You spend some time shadowing Roger, gaining proficiency in either Persuasion, Performance, or Deception

sheet.description: You gain proficiency in the Insight skill.

p.em: Prerequisite: A Dragonborn friend willing to be your personal trainer

description.p: In preparation for a second chance at a local Hrazhack pickup game, you get a super sweet training montage with Bharush. You win the game in stunning capacity and gain proficiency in the Athletics skill.

sheet.description: You gain proficiency in the Athletics skill.

p.em: Prerequisite: Access to a great deal of Pepperoni

description.p: You've spent a disturbing amount of time playing the literal version of "Hide the Pepperoni" on your friends. They gain a sizeable amount of pepperoni, and you gain proficency in the Sleight of Hand skill.

sheet.description: You gain proficiency in the Slight of Hand skill.

description.p: You've had a special crossbow installed in your right arm, which provides the following benefits:

ul.li: You ignore the loading quality of your arm crossbow.
Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature doesn’t impose disadvantage on your ranged attack rolls with your arm crossbow.
When you use the Attack action and attack with a one-handed weapon, you can use a bonus action to attack with your arm crossbow.

When you use the Attack action and attack with a one-handed weapon, you can use a bonus action to attack with your arm crossbow.

p.em: Prerequisite: A significant amount of time learning how to care for a small carnivorous murder monster

description.p: You have spent so much time with your new pet playing "Will it Carnivore?" by catching and feeding appropriately sized beasts to your slightly larger beast, you've gained a great deal of knowledge about the natural world. You gain proficiency in the Nature skill.

sheet.description: You gain proficiency in the Nature skill.

description.p: Increase your Constitution score by 1, up to a maximum of 20.

When you are the target of a weapon attack, you can use your reaction to use your breath weapon as a counter to the attack. Your breath weapon deals no damage, but instead the triggering weapon attack automatically misses.
Further the attacker must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or become blinded until the end of your turn.
Finally, if the triggering attack is made with a melee weapon that weapon is destroyed unless it is magical.

description.p: You instinctively know how to extend your powers to change your appearance to another creature, for a time. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Increase your Intelligence, Wisdwom, or Charisma by 1, to a maximum of 20.

When you use your Shapechanger feature while touching another willing or incapacitated creature, you can cause that creature's appearance to change as well. You decide its appearance, with the same restrictions as normal. This change in appearance lasts until you use your Shapechanger feature again or the changed creature completes a long rest. Once you change a creature's appearance in this way, you cannot do so again until you complete a long rest.

description.p: Your ability to adopt another creature's appearance is more pronounced with access to that creature's body. You gain the following benefits:

ul.li: Increase your Charisma by 1, to a maximum of 20.

If you touch an incapacitated or dead Meidum or small-sized humanoid for 1 minute and the nuse your Shapechanger feature to copy their appearance, you learn about their personality and all the information they would freely share with a casual acquaintance. This information allows you to pass yourself off as the creature to most observers. When you target a Small creature in this way you can change your size to match the target creature. If you do so, you revert back to Medium size when you use your Shapechanger feature again. Once you have adopted a creature's appearance in this way, you can't do so again until you complete a long rest.

description.p: As an action, you can buff two stats by 1 for three minutes. You also gain advantage on checks using those stats. The stats chosen can be the same stat. At the end of that time, you gain one level of exhaustion. You can use this any number of times per day, but a maximum of two times simultaneously. And if used simultaneously, you take an additional level of exhaustion.

description.p: Requires the WALLForged feat

Become less big by crapping out a pile of wood and stone. You are no longer wallforged, but can do grappling hook tricks successfully. After a long rest you can be wallforged again by eating a pile of wood and stone. Also using local wood and stone gives you the natural coloration of whatever part of the world you're in, granting advantage on stealth checks.
